programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow 2S - EP 9
programme.desc: Damien Dahrk and Malcolm Merlyn create a big aberration as they attempt to capture Rip in 1967.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow 2S - EP 10
programme.desc: The Legends must find the Spear of Destiny before they can rescue Rip, while Malcolm and Damien realize that Thawne is pitting them against each other.

programme.title: Earth's Great Seasons - EP 3
programme.desc: Every year, spectacular seasons transform our planet. Spring brings new life, but it's also a dash to wake up and get ahead of everyone else. Summer is a time of long days and glorious abundance. But the living isn't always easy when the temperatures rise. Autumn brings the world's most spectacular transformations. It's also the last chance to breed, to grow up, to stock up before the cold returns. During winter - the most magical, dramatic season of all - animals find inventive ways to survive.

programme.title: Eat The Week - EP 4
programme.desc: Coming to the rescue of 10 families who are facing universal culinary conundrums - whether that's eating the same old dishes every week, feeding fussy eaters or being short on time - Simon has the answer. Featuring inspiring recipes that are quick and simple to follow, stunning food photography and fascinating foodie stories with reporter and cook Michela Chiappa - Eat The Week is the delicious feel good food show for all the family.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 21
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes Adam Levine and Nicholas Braun ("Succession"). Maroon 5 perform their new single, "Memories," for the first time on TV.

programme.title: Mat Yoyo S3 - EP 19
programme.desc: Mat Yoyo - The New Generation is an educational program in its third season and continues to provide children with wholesome family edu-tainment and fun.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger - EP 4
programme.desc: Hero comes across an egg in the garden. To Leo's surprise, a baby Komodo dragon hatches from the egg instead of a baby bird. The Junior Rangers decide to bring the Komodo dragon back to the island it comes from. Leo, Katie, Hero and a sun bear cub set off for the rainforest to find the cub's mother. Alas, they end up trapped in an overgrowth of stinky Rafflesia flowers! Can the Junior Rangers, Hero and sun bear cub overcome the overpowering odour of the Rafflesias and escape?

programme.title: Franklin And Friends - EP 46
programme.desc: Franklin joins his familiar friends, Bear, Fox, Rabbit and the rest of the bunch, in new adventures in Woodland.

programme.title: Kate & Mim-Mim S2 - EP 14
programme.desc: Kate and her stuffed toy friends use their imaginations to go on wild and incredible adventures.

programme.title: Sesame Street S47 - EP 29
programme.desc: A landmark series set in an ethnically diverse urban neighborhood where every day is a sunny one. It features songs, skits, animation and, of course, Muppets to teach preschoolers basic educational and social concepts.

programme.title: Sesame Street S47 - EP 30
programme.desc: A landmark series set in an ethnically diverse urban neighborhood where every day is a sunny one. It features songs, skits, animation and, of course, Muppets to teach preschoolers basic educational and social concepts.

programme.title: Transformers Cyberverse - EP 0011 & 0012
programme.desc: When Bumblebee can't remember what his current mission on Earth is, Windblade repairs his memory chips, enabling him to rediscover his past adventures on Cybertron. When his memories are being repaired, Bumblebee gets a clue that will lead both him and Windblade to complete their mission and save their friends, unaware that a team of Decepticons are tracking them too!

programme.title: Kody Kapow S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Kody Kapow is about an aspiring martial arts-style superhero named Kody who spends the summer with his extended family in a small village in China. His grandfather, a martial arts master, teaches Kody ancient lessons of mindfulness, patience and perseverance, which Kody employs as he and his super spy cousin Mei set off on adventures in the village together with their tiger friend Goji.

programme.title: Sonic Boom S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Sonic, Tails, Amy, Knuckles, and Sticks reside on Seaside Island in Hedgehog Village. Together, they defend the island from various threats like Doctor Eggman and his robotic creation.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings - EP 1
programme.desc: He is big as a bear, strong as a bear, smart... as a bear. Naturally, no other animal dares to contest his bears privilege. That is no other animal except one: a tribe that belongs to the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists the lemmings.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S4 - EP 3
programme.desc: The Turtles face Shredder's new deadly assassin and uncover a new Kraang plot. They'll also encounter more mutants, discover more about the mysterious Kraang species, and venture into new realms.

programme.title: Abraureka S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: Its back! Abraureka Season 2 is going to magically present you with some crazy Science magic tricks. Cheryl and Kyle take to the streets to test the science know-hows of Singaporeans and they come to your schools for a big Science Surprise! Have your eyes glued and brains fixed on the screens because our little Science magicians are going show you tricks that you can try at home. Are you ready to learn the tricks and trades behind the magic of Science?

programme.title: 上食堂 Food Notes - EP 9
programme.desc: Hong Kongers go absolutely gaga about goose! From stir-fried goose intestine, braised goose tongue to gelatin made with goose brain, it seems almost every part of the goose can be eaten! Check out Food Notes as we appreciate the different Teochew and Cantonese styles of cooking goose in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Tugan Sokhiev Conducts Sumi Jo At Taipei National Concert Hall
programme.desc: Orchestre National Du Capitole De Toulouse at Taipei National Concert Hall. Conducted by Tugan Sokhiev with Sumi Jo.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 18 - EP 8
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 641
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Kitchen Whiz S7 - EP 16
programme.desc: Kitchen Whiz is a fast and fabulous kids game show with a focus on the world of food, cooking and food science.

programme.title: Belle & Sebastian - EP 0019 & 0020
programme.desc: When a courageous and wild young boy from the Alps befriends an exceptionally generous dog, that is shunned because of her enormous size, nobody can stop them from exploring every single peak of the valley together! Always on the lookout for adventure, Belle and Sebastian will rush to anybody's rescue, friend or foe, whatever the risk!

programme.title: Tobot S5 Part 2 - EP 0015 & 0016
programme.desc: Tobot is a cartoon series featuring transforming robot toys tasked to fight crime and protect the neighbourhood.

programme.title: Zak Storm S1 - EP 10

(重)《笑傲江湖》是改编自武侠巨作金庸的原著，由霍志揩执导，马景涛、范文芳等主演的古装电视剧。该剧讲述了华山弟子令狐冲（马景涛饰）为了替师父寻找秘籍《葵花宝典》，而从此卷入江湖争斗。.

programme.title: 玩具不插电 Toys Unplugged - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) In this episode, the hosts introduce how the hopscotch game is played. They are also at the indoor trampoline park trying out the bouncing sports and parkour activities. They visit a carpenter and learn about the artisan's spirit. They also teach viewers to make interesting DIY toys with metal tins. (重)在本集节目，主持人将介绍 "跳飞机"的玩法。接着，他们带领观众前往室内蹦床乐园，体验蹦床运动、尝试跑酷活动！另外，他们也将拜访一位工匠，了解何谓工匠精神。最后，教导观众如何用铁罐制作有趣好玩的小玩具！.

programme.title: 星期二特写-- 极限人生 Tuesday Report - No Limit - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Are there any professional wrestlers in Singapore? To be one in Singapore is already no easy feat, moreover a female professional wrestler. Known as Singapore's first female pro-wrestler, 24 year old Alexis Lee has been at it for 6 years, and till date she continues in her daily struggles. What pushes her on, in spite of her lack of parents' support, and financial pressures to earn her keep? What drives her fight to overcome her inner fears? (重)新加坡也有职业摔角手吗？要在台上任打任挨已不容易，更何况是当一名女性职业摔角手。新加坡第一名全职女摔角手李欣仪在过去6年里是如何在实战中，改变大众的刻板印象？24岁的欣仪是如何面对家人的反对，收入的不稳定，在自己的人生擂台上，进行了一场又一场的极限拼搏，活出自信？.

programme.title: 一家之宝 Our Family Joy - EP 1

Under the guidance of Chef Eric Teo, Desmond and the trio organized a buffet to reward the Pioneer and Merdeka generation. The boys' efforts moved their parents to tears. (重)黄振隆探访“虎妈”黄嫊方的家庭，与她的3个儿子打成一片。相处过程中，他得知3兄弟都喜欢烹饪，便安排他们与名厨张添来拜师学煮。在黄振隆和名厨的协助之下，三兄弟以父母的名义举办“新年派对”，烹调美味爱心自助餐，慰劳建国和立国一代们。三兄弟各司其职、齐心做公益，父母看在眼里，暖在心里，既感动又骄傲。.

programme.title: 愿者上钩 CyberPunk'D - EP 1
programme.desc: Strong passwords, privacy and good-old common sense. Those are the basics of good cyber-hygiene. Comedian Fakkah Fuzz learns more about how hacks happen, and how to stay safe on the internet. 法卡法兹就要踏上一段前所未有的旅程，去了解网络安全究竟。中世纪时期的密码，是给拥有特权的人士用来进入堡垒或城堡的。它简单、有效，却又异常脆弱。现在，我们即使拥有再高科技的保安设备，也抵不过一个密码用到底的行为。所以，尽管互联网危机四伏，却不是防不胜防的。只有那些不愿去面对、不愿去防备的人，才会落得《愿者上钩》的下场。.

programme.desc: (R) Singapore in the early 1900s, the height of colonial rule. We see coolies sharing lunch, mourners at a grand funeral and Europeans having tea - brought vividly to life in these rare archival films. (重)100年前的新加坡，我们在照片上看过，不过，会动的画面可算是十分罕见的。过去几十年，它们一直被保存在英国电影协会的气候控制库内。经过清理、数码化和修复，这些影片顿时恢复了生命力，为首次面对控制库外的观众做好准备。.

programme.title: 三个愿望 Three Wishes - EP 14

They are the parkour athletes, the professional wrestlers, the Go Kart racers and the ice hockey players - pursuing a passion with no limits. 跑酷健将飞檐走壁，挑战体能极限？摔角手在台上较劲是力量的挑战？卡丁车在赛道上飞驰、冰棍球员在溜冰场上比拼，是一场场极速的征战？全新系列《极限人生》带大家走进不畏劣势的运动员世界，看他们如何让冷门激发热情，挑战自我极限。.

programme.title: 单翼天使 My Guardian Angels - EP 2
programme.desc: Zhi Hong died due to a heart attack. Mandy held a grand funeral for him, thinking that Zhi Hong will leave her a sum of money. However, she finds out from his lawyer that he was bankrupt long ago and withdrew all his savings, only leaving a few hundred dollars in their joint account. With only a hundred thousand dollars left in her own account and an invalid credit card, Mandy feels lost. (PG)志鸿心脏病发身亡，Mandy以为他虽然变卖了家产，一定还留下大笔遗产，便为他办了风光葬礼，谁知过后才从律师口中得知志鸿早就破产，还把银行存款都提出，联名户头中只剩几百元，信用卡也不能再用，Mandy只剩下自己户头中的十几万，有些茫然。.

Our host will go knee-deep in mud, track through jungles, creep through barbed wire fences, just to give you that exclusive access. (重)(双声道-中/英)搜密新加坡第二系列节目带你穿街走巷寻访被遗忘的历史、私密的隐匿处、有趣的人物和另类工作，给你满满的惊喜！追随主持人的脚步踏上任务之旅，一起破解谜团、搜寻不为人知的地点、走访有趣故事的人物及探索本地让人咋舌的事项。.

programme.title: 我的打拚日记 Workman Diaries - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Most of the post-90 generation graduates are caught in jobs with long working hours and low pay. But for one brave soul, she chooses to exit and follow her heart. Beijing is home to many migrant worker families and for some, affordable child care means relying on willing and tired grandparents. And for some of the elderly migrant workers, after enduring many years of loneliness and hardship to support their family, they're faced with imminent retrenchment. (重)90后大学毕业生受不了电商工作加班无休，毅然裸辞去追梦。北漂夫妻在北京养育幼儿， 昂贵的生活负担迫使双方家长倾力协助。在北京15年孤苦的日子，年近七旬的清洁工，只望儿子顺利大学毕业。看北漂人为成就北京梦而奔走。.

programme.title: 绕着地球跑 Run To The World - EP 1

Zhengji rushes to Meida's house to verify the matter with Wu Chun, but he does not get to see Wu Chun as Wu Chun has left home. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)正基无意间看到永浩的日记，发现吴春很可能就是波兰。正基赶往美达家，想把一切搞.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 42
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Juxi finds out from Malu that Wu Chun is Bolan. Juxi is deeply regretful of chasing Wu Chun out of the company and for the slap that she gave Wu Chun previously. Malu informs Wu Chun of the identities of her birth parents. Wu Chun runs away when she cannot accept what she has been told. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)菊熙从马陆口中发现吴春就是波兰，后悔之前把吴春赶出丰吉堂还打她一巴掌。马陆到金龙甲的家找吴春，告诉她正基和菊熙就是她的亲生父母。吴春一时之间无法接受，再度失踪。.

programme.title: 医生们 Doctors - EP 13
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Yundao finally manages to have lunch with Huijing. However, Huijing tells him that she loves Zhihong only. Ruiyu is jealous of Huijing who's getting the attention of both Yundao and Zhihong. She reports on Huijing to the hospital for accepting a patient's luxury car as gift. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)允道总算争取到了和慧静吃午饭的机会；但吃饭的时候，慧静明确告诉他只爱智弘一个人，拒绝了他的追求。瑞雨因妒忌慧静得到允道和智弘的宠爱，不削地向医院的监察组举报了慧静收受患者送的车。.

(PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)慧静发现智弘一直都在努力帮她免于惩戒后，深感他的爱意。她主动到智弘的办公室坦诚地向他表达心意。受到慧静明确拒绝的允道不甘心，于是打电话给慧静，表示要继续追求她。.

"中国梦之声：我们的歌"启用了全新节目模式，旨在让榜样歌手与新声歌手联手同台竞演，两代歌手在不知对方身份情况下合唱同一首歌，“听歌识人”完成互选，并在组队竞演、对抗踢馆选手中不断挑战音乐进阶，共赴巅峰对决。暂定出席新生代歌手包括肖战，华晨宇，毛不易，刘宪华，陈意涵 etc. 榜样歌手会有李克勤，任贤齐，费玉清，周华健，草蜢，叶丽仪，徐小凤等.

programme.title: 天生一对 Love Destiny - EP 16

It is about a kind-hearted woman named Ketsurang whose soul is transported back in time to the Ayutthaya Period to live in the body of a woman called Karaket, who is cursed for plotting a murder. However, she adapts to the period and slowly changes Det's attitude towards her and he even has affections for her. But will they be together and live happily ever after? (PG)《天生一对》讲述了生活在现代的佳苏兰，阴差阳错穿越回了泰国古代大城王朝，邂逅德特，发生了一段纠葛的爱情故事。.

programme.title: Romeo and Juliet - EP 50
programme.desc: The Vishwas are in the wedding business and the Segarens run a funeral business. Weddings and Funerals are polar opposites and so are these two families, due to past differences. As fate would have it, the inheritors of both businesses cross paths and love blossoms! Like any other Shakespearean theatre play the series embeds itself with elements of theatre, literature, romance, power, betrayal, egoism, history, comedy, tragedy and redemption!

programme.title: Galatta 360 - Talkshow - EP 1
programme.desc: Galatta 360 is a brand new talkshow series that aims to educate, entertain, and mostimportantly, chase away those Monday blues! It will connect with viewers not only throughtraditional broadcast platforms, but also through digital media, particularly on social mediaplatforms. Galatta 360 is a highly engaging format will include audience interaction throughnew and refreshing ways.

programme.title: YAAR 3 - EP 29
programme.desc: With Sathish's death amid investigations, Jana tries to connect the dots after learning about the threats Sathish left his sister. Nathiya is panicking as she is a suspect. She tells Nila to lie for her. Could she be behind this murder?

programme.desc: Sasi is bracing himself to tell the truth about his betrayal to Karthik. Can he bring himself to do it?

programme.title: The History of the Pit Stop
programme.desc: The mavericks who pioneered the modern pit stop made it a raceday staple that takes less than two seconds. What can be done in the time it takes to blink? This is the story of the brave mavericks who invented the techniques and technologies that took the pit stop from minutes-long racing rarity to an F1 staple that takes less than two seconds to complete.

programme.title: Let It Ride
programme.desc: The story of Craig Kelly is the story of snowboarding: rambunctious, raw and totally revolutionary. From children's toy to cultural phenomenon, the story of snowboarding is one of progression, rebellion and evolution. It's a story that can't be told without Craig Kelly, who shaped the sport more than almost anyone.

programme.title: By the flip of a coin
programme.desc: Enduro rider Greg Callaghan started his racing career as a privateer living out of a van to compete in MTB. Enduro rider Greg Callaghan started his racing career as a privateer living out of a van to compete in the sport. Get to know the current privateers who work hard to fund themselves through the MTB race season.

programme.title: The 3 types of luck
programme.desc: Check out life behind the racing at the biggest enduro event on the planet at Crankworx Whistler. Discover the unique pressure that comes with riding in the most prestigious event on the Enduro World Series calendar at Crankworx in Whistler.

programme.title: ABC of... Crashed Ice
programme.desc: Learn about the fastest sport on skates and find out about what it takes to make it in Red Bull Crashed Ice. Learn about the terminology of this crazy high-speed competition and get the lowdown on all the rules that keep it from being absolutely brutal – this is your guide to what it takes to cut it in Red Bull Crashed Ice.

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: With a major tournament on the horizon, can Leffen recover from a disappointing EGLX showing in Canada? After a disappointing seventh place finish at the EGLX tournament, Leffen must rediscover the mindset that once made him a Melee winner. The first step: lots of practice with top competition to prepare for the upcoming GOML 2016 tournament.

programme.title: Reclaim
programme.desc: Leffen finds himself in Winners Semis at GOML 2016 against one of the best players in Melee history: Armada. Leffen finds himself in Winners Semis at GOML 2016 but is up against one of the most dominant players in Melee history: Armada. Can Leffen rediscover the elite form needed to win and reclaim his place among the gods of Melee?

programme.title: Kenya
programme.desc: Rob Warner heads to Kenya with freeride pro Matt Jones to ride Mount Kenya. Rob Warner heads to Kenya with freeride pro Matt Jones where they ride one of the highest mountains in Africa and get up close to some of the local wildlife.

programme.title: The most significant race of the season?
programme.desc: Riders prepare for the prestigious Daytona SX, but a win is unlikely to prove decisive in the series battle. Only once in the past 24 years has a rider left Daytona as the AMA Supercross series leader and not won the title. But with the championship a tight four-way battle, will victory at the biggest race of the season prove to be so significant in 2019?

programme.title: A battle of team-mates
programme.desc: KTM team-mates Cooper Webb and Marvin Musquin are jostling for the top spot in an increasingly heated battle. While Honda's Ken Roczen is doing everything he can to get a win, the KTM team-mates Cooper Webb and Marvin Musquin are jostling for the top spot in an increasingly heated battle.

programme.title: Rogue Elements
programme.desc: The story of an intrepid few who pursued the full force of the snow storms of winter 2017. In the winter of 2017, the magnitude of winter's force was on full display. Blizzards across the globe buried towns in an instant before disappearing just as fast. This is the story of the intrepid few who pursued the storm's edge.

programme.title: On the Pipe 7: The Last Hit
programme.sub-title: Get up close to epic dirt bike riding
programme.desc: Take an epic adventure around the mind-blowing feats of dirt bike riders and their record-breaking jumps. Join director Jay Schweitzer on a historical journey across the globe documenting the most progressive dirt bike riding of all time and taking an epic adventure around the most mind-blowing feats and impressive record-breaking jumps.

programme.title: Roxrite in Kolkata
programme.desc: B-Boy Roxrite catches up with the local B-Boys in Kolkata, India. B-Boy Roxrite catches up with the local B-Boys in Kolkata, India. He finds out how they found their space to break and how they find their inspiration.

programme.title: Lil G in New Delhi
programme.desc: B-Boy Lil G checks out the local B-Boy scene in New Delhi, India and meets some of the breakers. B-Boy Lil G checks out the local B-Boy scene in New Delhi. He gets to know when breaking started up in the area of India, how these B-Boys met each other and what they see it growing into.

programme.title: Rise of the Bullet
programme.desc: A three-time world champ in MX2, Jeffrey Herlings steps up to the sport's highest echelon: MXGP. Follow the journey of legendary Jeffrey Herlings as he rides in his first MXGP season. After becoming three-time world champ in MX2, it's time to step up to the sport's most prestigious class.

programme.title: A Date with the Strait
programme.desc: Three paddleboarders attempt to cross the Bass Strait, 300km of deadly water between Australia and Tasmania. Zeb Walsh has dreamed of paddleboarding the channel between Australia and Tasmania since he was 15 years old. For his attempt, he enlists two friends to brave the choppy, shark-infested waters of the Bass Strait and make history with him.

programme.title: Reverence
programme.desc: This film delves into the psyche of elite mountain bike athletes in a bid to understand their motivation. This film delves into the psyche of elite mountain bike athletes in a bid to understand their motivation to tirelessly pursue their legacy.
